EduCraft—Javadocs

Packages 
Package Description
org.educraft
Provides the classes necessary to create a new mod for minecraft (educraft) that is aimed at promoting collaborative learning in primary schools, particularly with reference to numeracy education.
org.educraft.block
Provides everything required to create and manage EduCraft blocks.
org.educraft.block.calculator
Provides the classes necessary to create and use the calculator block.
org.educraft.block.operators
Provides the classes necessary to create and use the operator bench.
org.educraft.block.ordering
Provides the classes necessary to create and use the ordering bench.
org.educraft.client  
org.educraft.entity
Provides the classes necessary to create the different custom mobs used in the mod.
org.educraft.item
Provides the classes necessary to create items used on the crafting board such as numbers & math operators
